page.title: 15MORETON HALL SCHOOL
page.content: About 1 mile north from Gobowen lies a private{girls boarding school}called {Moreton Hall.}There are about 310 pupils at the moment, but the school is rapidly expanding. To house the growing number of girls a new boarding block has recently been built. There are also plans for building a new sports complex because of the great interest in sports. The main school itself is a{listed building.}It used to be a farm and country house, then in 1919 the school moved from Oswestry to the present location. Girls come to Moreton Hall from all over the world:Japan,Germany,Holland, Portugal,France,parts of Africa,Middle East,United States and Hong Kong.Inevitably they also come from England. There are about 30 day boarders.
